name: Billy the Nerd in: Computer Trouble
name_original: Billy the Nerd in: Computer Trouble
description:
You wake up and notice that your Arch Linux (You use Arch btw) computer has been infected with a virus! You must go into your computer (you're a nerd, you made a tool to do that of course) to stop the infection.

Contains:

10 Levels of Virus Investigating

A game changing final boss!

A timer looming over your head oh god what happens when it hits 0
